nodes.text: Imperial Heavy Troopers were a branch of the Imperial Army's Stormtrooper Corps. Heavy Troopers were equipped with special combat armor and electrostaffs in order to deal with highly resilient foes.
Imperial Heavy Troopers first appeared in the 2008 Legends video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed. Their first canonical appearance was in the 2014 mobile game Star Wars: Galactic Defense.
